body_html: I just ran into this as well, including the lack of documentation clarification with regards to how bernoulli_ actually operates. Before raising an issue / asking in the Slack channel, I went hunting as it seemed an obvious oversight and found this issue. If I get the chance I'll look into filling in the docs more.

body: I just ran into this as well, including the lack of documentation clarification with regards to how `bernoulli_` actually operates. Before raising an issue / asking in the Slack channel, I went hunting as it seemed an obvious oversight and found this issue. If I get the chance I'll look into filling in the docs more.
